original_title: Günter Wand: My Life, My Music
overview: Foreign, Foreign Documentaries, Classical Instrumental Music, Classical Music - Through archival performance footage and candid interview clips, this biographical program pays tribute to the long and fruitful career of German conductor Günter Wand, who shares his own impressions of his musical accomplishments. Highlights include a glimpse of Wand in action, rehearsing with his orchestra for performances of Brahms's Symphony no. 1 and Symphony no. 2 and Tchaikovsky's Symphony no. 6.
title: Günter Wand: My Life, My Music
